name:
As promised, I’ve written up the fun IoT project I worked on using ESPHome, Home Assistant, and an e-ink ESP32 dev board. Super fun!

https://www.linkedin.com/pulse/daddyboard-30-missioncloud/

https://github.com/cleverdevil/daddyboard-eink

summary:
@cleverdevil Awesome! Looking forward to diving into this.
I think I see a typo. The list just after “For the Daddyboard, I wanted to display just a few simple things:” looks like it was supposed to be three bullets but the second and third ones got merged.
